No, macnet. Apparently turning H-OVA screenshots into books is a thing now.

Ummm...
Am I the only one who think that this seems like just a screenshot from the original (Video) ??
I can't believe Blue Gale released a manga version?? NICE.

I'm not sure how I feel about the protagonist and how he is designed. I personally feel that he should have been designed as a middle aged old man with a pot belly and balding head. His eyes should have been drawn more to resemble a lecherous gaze that fits the image of a depraved man who married a young mother who has the intention of raping little girls.
Just watch the hentai version of this :P
I unfortunately hate this big-eyed art style, partly because I think it's boring and generic and partly because it ruins hentai that have concepts I love.
why read it panel by panel when i can just watch the hentai version
